body: $AAPL was analyzed by 49 analysts. The buy consensus is at 84%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/analyst-ratings?utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

$SPY Keep THIS in mind, folks, when you thinking about tech, it's growth comes from without inflation at a 6+% level.

K? Following? 

And, like it or not, all three months, CPI has been hot, 6.4% October,  6.8% November, and, just today, 7%, registering December and sealing FATE of Q4, with 0% letdown.
Keep also noted, PPI has been elevated + PMI Flash just came in WEAK for December, real weak, actually. 

So, to think tech ERs golden, you might want to re-think that optimism because inflation REALLY STICKS IT TO THE MAN AT over 5%, just look at 1970s, fraught with inflation, fraught w/ a stale stock market $AMD $AAPL  👌👍🚨🔥👀

And, $FB might not do well either, they were working vs a high dollar .96+ MOST OF Q4, so that effects their overseas business, making matters worse, DECEMBER, the holiday month the dollar dipped to 94-95 so that's some serious headwinds for RPU (revenue per user) for Zuck w/o even totally infusing inflation into their #s

links.title: Apple Car rumors inspire Korean battery manufacturers to form task force
links.description: Apple Car rumors just won't die, and maybe there's a truth living somewhere. At least that's what it looks like based on a report published on Wednesday by 9 to 5 Mac, which claims that South Korean battery manufacturers have formed an Apple Car task force.
